description: Structured information describing a collection of human and/or animal data.

name.description: Descriptive name (title) under which this dataset is going to be published.

description.description: A short description (abstract) with which this dataset is going to be published .

activities.description: Link to all activities that were performed for generating this dataset.

owners.description: Link to all persons that are responsible for this dataset.

contributors.description: Link to all persons that were involved in the creation/publication of this dataset.

license.description: Link to a license that defines the conditions under which this dataset can be (re)used.

embargoStatus.description: Link to the general condition that defines the availability of this dataset.

specimenGroups.description: Link to all specimen groups listing the subjects that were studied in this dataset.

publications.description: Link to all research publications that were conducted on / are related to this dataset.

file.description: Link to all files that belong to this dataset.

formats.description: Link to all file formats used in this dataset.

project.description: Link to all larger research projects in which context this dataset was created.

modality.description: Link to all experiment modalities that were conducted in this dataset.

containerURL.description: Single Uniform Resource Locator (URL) that points to the physical location of this dataset on an EBRAINS storage.

dataLink.description: Single Uniform Resource Locator (URL) that points to the physical location of this dataset on a storage not hosted by EBRAINS.

DOI.description: Link to the Digitial Object Identifier (DOI) that is assigned to this dataset.

parcellationAtlas.description: Link to all parcellation atlases that were used in this dataset.

parcellationRegion.description: Link to all parcellation regions that were studied in this dataset.

referenceSpace.description: Link to all brain reference spaces that were used in this dataset.

versionOf.description: Link to all previous versions of this dataset.
